types.section:
{{fr-noun|m}}

# [[flywheel]] {{gloss|rotating mass used to maintain the speed of a machine within certain limits while the machine receives or releases energy at a varying rate, or as a form of energy storage}}
types.html:
volant d'inertie m (plural volants d'inertie)

  1. flywheel (rotating mass used to maintain the speed of a machine within certain limits while the machine receives or releases energy at a varying rate, or as a form of energy storage)

title: volant d'inertie
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /vɔ.lɑ̃ d‿i.nɛʁ.ti/
